title: Drawing, "Drawing.  a. Botanical sketch.  b. Sketch.  Seascape.  Like -195", June 2, 1857
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at top right:  Top red / some of the / leaves topped with scarlet; and at bottom right:  June 2d / 57

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at ?:  Dark shadows Laky lights / blue gray shadow / gold very dark / gold / sea
description:
Recto:  Vertical sketch of plants and trees.
Verso: Horizontal sketch of the sky over the sea.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  a. Botanical sketch.  b. Sketch.  Seascape.  Like -195", June 2, 1857.
June 2, 1857. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-202.
